commit message:
Default the ACRA reporting to on for github builds
Play Store default is off.
Changed the Updater to stop looking in master branch. Just grab the latest release tag and use that to build the download URL.

Merge pull request #1131 from garvankeeley/github-acra-default-to-on

Default the ACRA reporting to on for github builds
patched Updater to make tests pass
deleted dead code and bumped local caching up to 12 hours from 300 seconds.

1129 - add map.postInvalidate() on resume to force a redraw of the points
I can't repro, but this would make sense to fix #1120
Instead of attempting to invalidate a small rect when a point is added, which reportedly is causing bugs where the points aren't drawing, just do a full invalidate.
Add addition zoom for medium screen

Merge pull request #1135 from garvankeeley/1129-invalidate-map

1129 - add map.postInvalidate() on resume to force a redraw of the points

Merge pull request #1134 from crankycoder/features/cleanup-deadcode

deleted dead code

Merge pull request #1133 from crankycoder/features/i-hate-master

1132 - Changed the Updater to stop looking in master branch.

* Default the signal strength and CDMA dbm to be UNKNOWN_SIGNAL
* if no telephony hardware is detected, the CellScannerImplementation::start() short circuits and doesn't enable any listeners
* stop() on the CellScannerImplementation will only unhook the listener if it's non-null and the telephony type is GSM or CDMA.
* ScanManager won't create a CellScanner, or try to start one if no telephony hardware is detected.

Merge pull request #1138 from crankycoder/features/1137-no-telephony

1137 - fix crash on tablets
